scripts.build: npm run build:ng-openapi && npm run build:http-resource && npm run build:zod
scripts.publish:prepare: npm run build:ng-openapi && npm run publish:check
scripts.publish:local: npm run publish:prepare && cd dist/packages/ng-openapi && npm publish --registry http://localhost:4873
scripts.publish:beta: npm run publish:prepare && cd dist/packages/ng-openapi && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.publish:stable: npm run publish:prepare && cd dist/packages/ng-openapi && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && npm run publish:stable
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && npm run publish:stable
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && npm run publish:stable
scripts.release:beta: npm run version:beta && npm run publish:beta
scripts.release:alpha: npm run version:alpha && npm run publish:beta
scripts.test:install: npm pack dist/packages/ng-openapi && npm install -g ng-openapi-*.tgz
